config.name: uglify
value: options : { banner  : '/* <%= pkg.name %> - <%= pkg.description %> - V<%= pkg.version %> */\n' }
api : { files : [ { expand : true, cwd : 'src', src : '**/*.js', dest : 'dist' } ] }

config.name: mochacli
value: options : { 'reporter' : 'spec', 'inline-diffs' : false, 'no-exit' : true, 'force' : false, 'check-leaks' : true, 'bail' : false }

register.name: hint
register.description: Hint & validate your code with JsHint et JSCS

register.name: build
register.description: Processing Hint, unit tests, and minification
